about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Kiwashi Technology has two business divisions
about.softwareDesc: We focus on developing process automation systems to help enterprises transform repetitive, time-consuming, and error-prone workflows into stable and traceable digital systems, reducing manual operation costs and improving overall operational efficiency. In many organizations, workflows often rely on manual operations and individual experience. As the scale grows, problems also expand. We gain a deep understanding of actual workflows, reorganize the data flow and decision points at each stage, and provide customized automation systems that meet practical needs. In system design, we emphasize scalability and long-term maintainability, ensuring systems can adjust as the organization grows without frequent reconstruction. At the same time, we emphasize process transparency, allowing managers to grasp status in real-time, reduce communication costs, and improve overall decision-making efficiency.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We focus on software system development and process automation, helping enterprises establish a stable and scalable technical foundation.
services.service1Desc: Tailor-made internal management systems, backend and API integration based on enterprise needs.
services.service2Desc: Automate repetitive tasks to improve efficiency and reduce human error.
services.service3Desc: Corporate image websites, backend systems and interactive frontend interfaces.
services.service4Desc: Existing system performance optimization, feature expansion and long-term maintenance.
services.service5Desc: Integrate multi-source data and build reports and decision support systems.
services.service6Desc: Provide architecture planning, technology selection and development process recommendations.
